Halfling

Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Size. Your size is Small.

Lucky. When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.FBDAM8XYM5SIPTYD]{Lucky}

Halfling Nimbleness. You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.D3SAIQ4TMZYXKUBP]{Halfling Nimbleness}

Subrace. You get a subrace.

Lightfoot

Naturally Stealthy. You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.VPOIDKJSYHYN1T4O]{Naturally Stealthy}

Stout*

Sturdy Resilience. You have advantage on Saving Throws against poison, and you have Resistance against poison damage. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.N7JIOQTDEJNASYTR]{Sturdy Resilience}
